barnepensjon.title: Child pension
barnepensjon.text: If you are a child and lose one or both of your parents, you can get financial support. The pension will ensure you an income to live on.

engangsstonad.title: One-time benefit
engangsstonad.text: You can receive a one-off benefit if you have not had an income that entitles you to parental benefits. There are usually two requirements you must meet to receive a one-time benefit.
